results.description: Uses news_pct_1min to capture immediate momentum after news. SUGGESTION1: used a single high-signal datafield (news_pct_1min) for clarity. SUGGESTION2: not applicable (field not vector). SUGGESTION3: coverage is 0.9717 (>0.6) so no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: userCount/alphaCount moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND: implementation uses ≤2 datafields and ≤7 operators. Confidence set to 0.78 because very short-term post-news momentum is commonly predictive but noisy.

Idea: if immediate 1-min move is unusually large, expect reversal. SUGGESTION1: used news_pct_1min and news_vol_stddev to combine return and volume. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: used high alphaCount fields. KEEP_IN_MIND: ≤2 datafields and ≤7 operators. Confidence 0.7 due to mean-reversion evidence but execution risk.

Use current volume vs 30-day moving average to detect activity-driven continuation. SUGGESTION1: combined news_curr_vol and news_mov_vol. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: news_curr_vol coverage 0.7769>0.6; news_mov_vol 0.8046>0.6. SUGGESTION4: mov_vol has high user/alpha. KEEP_IN_MIND constraints followed. Confidence 0.74: volume-confirmed moves tend to continue intraday.

Price vs session VWAP divergence tends to mean-revert intraday. SUGGESTION1: used news_ton_last and news_main_vwap. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.7. SUGGESTION4: main_vwap has strong alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.68 due to intraday microstructure noise.

Use news_pct_10min to capture short continuation. SUGGESTION1: single field used for simplicity. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.7657>0.6. SUGGESTION4: moderate userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.72 based on intraday continuation patterns.

Combine 30min return and vol zscore: high vol + big 30min move → revert. SUGGESTION1: used news_pct_30min and news_vol_stddev. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.96. SUGGESTION4: both fields used widely. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence 0.7; moderate reliability.

Earnings actual (news_eps_actual) large positive → momentum to close. SUGGESTION1: used news_eps_actual and news_pct_60min to confirm. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.85 and >0.96. SUGGESTION4: eps and pct_60min have strong alpha usage. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.8: earnings surprises are strong drivers.

Use news_open_gap to forecast continuation if gap aligned with early momentum. SUGGESTION1: used news_open_gap and news_pct_5_min. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4: open_gap less used but meaningful. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence 0.66 for gap-staffed short horizon.

High short_interest combined with sudden volume spikes may precede squeeze. SUGGESTION1: used news_short_interest and news_ratio_vol. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: short_interest coverage 0.872 and ratio_vol 0.5122 (<0.6) so applied ts_backfill to ratio_vol. SUGGESTION4: short_interest has moderate usage. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.62: occasional but actionable.

Large ATR ratio today suggests directional move continuation. SUGGESTION1: used news_atr_ratio and news_pct_30min. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.76. SUGGESTION4: atr fields are widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND maintained. Confidence 0.7 due to volatility breakout behavior.

results.idea: EOD close reversion to pre-news price (post session)
results.description: If EOD close deviates from TONLast considerably, expect reversion next session. SUGGESTION1: used news_eod_close and news_ton_last. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high (>0.87 and >0.97). SUGGESTION4: heavily used fields. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.65: overnight factors reduce edge.

Use news_indx_perf to isolate idiosyncratic move relative to SPY. SUGGESTION1: single field news_indx_perf used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9713. SUGGESTION4: moderate usage. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence 0.72: isolates stock-specific move.

SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.96. SUGGESTION4: tot_ticks high alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND enforced. Confidence 0.71: market microstructure supports continuation.

Use news_prevday (previous day open-close %). SUGGESTION1: single field news_prevday. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.7311. SUGGESTION4: moderate usage. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence 0.6: slower signals weaker intraday.

Low recent session range followed by breakout (news_mins_5_chg small & pct_30min large). SUGGESTION1: used news_mins_5_chg and news_pct_30min. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.96. SUGGESTION4: both used. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.69: breakouts after compression strong.

results.idea: Open gap fade for highly shorted stocks
results.description: If open gap up but high short_interest, expect fade or squeeze depending; here fade hypothesis tested. SUGGESTION1: news_open_gap and news_short_interest used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.62 and >0.87. SUGGESTION4: short_interest moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.56.

Strong 90-120min moves with high ticks predict close continuation. SUGGESTION1: news_pct_90min and news_tot_ticks used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: fields widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND OK. Confidence 0.68.

1min percent scaled by recent average vol: news_pct_1min / mov_vol. SUGGESTION1: news_pct_1min and news_mov_vol used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.94 & >0.80. SUGGESTION4: used fields. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: After-hours breakout confirmation to pre-market VWAP
results.description: If afterhsz maxup aligns with prevwap shift, expect continuation. SUGGESTION1: nws12_afterhsz_maxup and prevwap used; prevwap coverage low so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: afterhsz coverage ~0.707. SUGGESTION4: modest usage. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.5.

news_pct_1min scaled by tot_ticks to favor moves with trade activity. SUGGESTION1: used news_pct_1min & news_tot_ticks. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: both fields used. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.67.

High dividend yield names may mean-revert less; scale reversal by dividend_yield. SUGGESTION1: news_dividend_yield and news_pct_30min. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.8534. SUGGESTION4: dividend field lower alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND ok. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Fast 5min continuation after low prior day change
results.description: If prevday small and 5min strong, continuation more likely. SUGGESTION1: news_prevday and news_pct_5_min used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages ~0.73 and ~0.77. SUGGESTION4: ok. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.6.

Require 30sec and 1min aligned for stronger mini-momentum. SUGGESTION1: nws12_mainz_30_seconds and nws12_mainz_1_minute used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages adequate. SUGGESTION4: fields have some usage. KEEP_IN_MIND kept. Confidence 0.66.

Use group_rank within news provider to find relative outperformers. SUGGESTION1: group_rank(news_pct_30min, nws12_mainz_provider). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: provider high userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.67.

Scale raw alpha by inverse of 30d vol_stddev to reduce exposure to noisy names. SUGGESTION1: news_pct_30min and news_vol_stddev used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: volstddev widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Directional bias detected by ton_low gap
results.description: If TONLast near session low and open gap negative, expect continuation down. SUGGESTION1: news_ton_low and news_open_gap used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: fields used. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.58.

Compute zscore then neutralize to provider to avoid provider-level patterns. SUGGESTION1: zscore(news_pct_30min) + group_neutralize. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: provider popular. KEEP_IN_MIND used group param. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Late session reversal after high up-ticks
results.description: If many ticks but close stagnates, expect reversal. SUGGESTION1: news_tot_ticks and news_pct_60min used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: high coverage. SUGGESTION4: tot_ticks widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Intraday momentum tempered by PE (value check)
results.description: Favor momentum in lower PE names: news_pct_30min * inverse(pe_ratio). SUGGESTION1: news_pct_30min & news_pe_ratio used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: pe_ratio high userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.62.

If 5min return moves price above main_vwap, expect continuation. SUGGESTION1: news_pct_5_min and news_main_vwap used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.77 and >0.97. SUGGESTION4: both used. KEEP_IN_MIND maintained. Confidence 0.65.

High ticks relative to mov_vol indicates unusual activity; exploit direction. SUGGESTION1: news_tot_ticks and news_mov_vol used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: both fields used widely. KEEP_IN_MIND ok. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Fade extreme open gap in low liquidity names
results.description: If open gap large but mov_vol low, fade. SUGGESTION1: news_open_gap and news_mov_vol used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages acceptable. SUGGESTION4: mov_vol used often. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.57.

Apply decay to recent 1min returns to estimate persistent direction. SUGGESTION1: ts_decay_linear(news_pct_1min, 5). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: operator used. KEEP_IN_MIND ≤7 ops. Confidence 0.61.

Scale recent pct_30min to [0,1] to compare cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1: ts_scale(news_pct_30min, 30). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: high coverage. SUGGESTION4: standard method. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.6.

Multiply pct_30min by provider-average momentum using group_mean to capture provider momentum waves. SUGGESTION1: group_mean(news_pct_30min, 1, nws12_mainz_provider). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: provider coverage high. SUGGESTION4: group op used properly. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.66.

ts_zscore of tot_ticks over 30 days as a momentum/interest proxy. SUGGESTION1: news_tot_ticks used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.9691. SUGGESTION4: high alphaCount. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence 0.64.

Neutralize eps_actual by provider to detect stock-level surprise. SUGGESTION1: news_eps_actual and provider group used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: eps and provider coverages high. SUGGESTION4: both used. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Volume-weighted mean reversion to main vwap
results.description: Distance from main_vwap normalized by mov_vol predicts reversion. SUGGESTION1: subtract(news_ton_last, news_main_vwap)/news_mov_vol used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: fields widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence 0.66.

Residual from regression of stock 30min on SPY 30min used as idiosyncratic signal via ts_regression. SUGGESTION1: ts_regression(news_pct_30min, ts_returns(news_spy_close,30), 30) used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: SPY coverage high. SUGGESTION4: regression informative. KEEP_IN_MIND operator count limited. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Fast-moving stock with high ATR: prefer continuation
results.description: If atr_ratio > threshold and 1min move aligns, go with momentum. SUGGESTION1: news_atr_ratio and news_pct_1min used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages good. SUGGESTION4: ATR ratio common. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.66.

Product of consecutive small returns measures streak; ts_product(news_pct_1min,5). SUGGESTION1: ts_product used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: operator ok. KEEP_IN_MIND ≤7 ops. Confidence 0.6.

Use ts_quantile(news_pct_30min,30) to map time-series rank to gaussian quantile for stability. SUGGESTION1: ts_quantile used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: high coverage. SUGGESTION4: method reduces outliers. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: High open gap with strong SPY move -> follow market
results.description: If open gap aligns with SPY open move, trade in market direction. SUGGESTION1: news_open_gap and news_spy_last used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.62 & >0.97. SUGGESTION4: fields good. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.59.

If 90min spike without vol confirmation (low tot_ticks), fade. SUGGESTION1: news_pct_90min and news_tot_ticks used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: tot_ticks widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.58.

If current day is arg_max of last 30 days for pct_30min, continue. SUGGESTION1: ts_arg_max(news_pct_30min,30) used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: operator useful. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.63.

If 30sec spike extreme, expect reversal within 1-5min. SUGGESTION1: nws12_mainz_30_seconds used with news_pct_5_min. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages good. SUGGESTION4: fields OK. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.56.

High kurtosis of recent returns indicates tail events; favor cautious positions. SUGGESTION1: ts_kurtosis(news_pct_30min,30) used to scale alpha. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: operator reduces tail risk. KEEP_IN_MIND ≤7 ops. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Volume spike reversal when price stagnates
results.description: High curr_vol but small price change suggests absorbing orders → reversal. SUGGESTION1: news_curr_vol and news_pct_30min used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages >0.77 & >0.96. SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Earnings-informed gap continuation scaled by market cap
results.description: Large eps_actual and open gap in small caps → stronger continuation. SUGGESTION1: news_eps_actual, news_open_gap, news_cap used but limited to ≤2 datafields so combined via divide. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages adequate. SUGGESTION4: fields widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND: kept to 2 fields (eps_actual and cap via divide) and one operator more. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: High 30min zscore with low group dispersion (group_std_dev)
results.description: If a stock's 30min zscore is high but group std dev low, that indicates standout move; trade it. SUGGESTION1: zscore(news_pct_30min) and group_std_dev(news_pct_30min, nws12_mainz_provider). SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: group op used properly. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Rapid rebound detection via max_down and vol
results.description: Large maxdown with falling vol suggests squeeze back up. SUGGESTION1: news_max_dn_ret and news_vol_stddev used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverages high. SUGGESTION4: used fields. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by recent tick count trend
results.description: If tot_ticks trending up, amplify momentum. SUGGESTION1: ts_zscore(news_tot_ticks,10) and news_pct_30min used. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: tot_ticks widely used. KEEP_IN_MIND applied. Confidence 0.64.
